# Cancelled - 875 Heron Road Rehabilitation Project
===========================

### Project Reference

* Project Title:  **875 Heron Road Rehabilitation Project**
* Tender Reference Number: `EP095-220899/B`
* Amended: 1 time
* Published on: February 15, 2024
* Closing Date: March 31, 2024, at 00:00:00 GMT

### Project Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has decided to cancel the **875 Heron Road Rehabilitation Project** tender. The decision was made in accordance with Section 10.2(d) of the referenced Request For Proposal (RFP). The optimization of PSPC's Real Property Portfolio and the need to utilize existing office space inventory were key considerations in this decision.

### Reason For Cancellation

The cancellation of the tender was not made lightly and follows an exhaustive review of various factors by PSPC. The project's scope and requirements may have undergone significant changes since the RFP was published.

### Acknowledgement

PSPC expresses its gratitude to all interested suppliers who expressed interest in the project. We appreciate their interest and look forward to their participation in future PSPC procurement opportunities.

### Important Notice

Although the tender is cancelled, we reserve the right to continue or modify the project as required by PSPC's objectives and goals. No Offer or Proposal received in response to this Invitation To Participate will be deemed a de facto offer and will not be considered as binding upon PSPC.

### Notice Type
* Request for Proposal

### Definitive Description
Commercial and office building construction services

### Public Notice
Public notice was made in accordance to PSPC's policies and procedures. The notice was available on PSPC's website.

### Related Documents
Access to **875 Heron Road Rehabilitation Project** RF request is Not Available (N/A)

The **Public Services and Procurement Canada** (PSPC) has made the decision to cancel the project. We are truly sorry for any inconvenience caused.
